items.name: a book
items.description: It appears to be a collection of stories by Edgar Allan Poe.

actions.message: You read several spine-chilling tales that send shivers down your spine. The stories seem to come alive in this haunted place.
As you carefully flip through the pages of the book, a leather bookmark falls out and lands on the floor!
actions.alreadyPerformedMessage: You have already searched through the book thoroughly. There is nothing else hidden within its pages.

items.name: a lit candle
items.description: It is just your basic magically burning candle.

items.name: some sheet music
items.description: It is sheet music for an eerie piece of piano music.

items.name: a plastic spork
items.description: It is one of those weird eating utensils that is both a spoon and fork.

items.name: several plates
items.description: Three of the plates seem to be arranged in a pattern. There is a larger plate with two smaller ones on top of it on each side.

items.name: a rubber chicken
items.description: It is a novelty rubber chicken that looks as if it were trying to exit the mansion but took a wrong turn.

items.name: a log
items.description: It is a small log, partially burned.

items.name: dead flowers
items.description: This small boquet was probably once very pretty, but today it is dead and wilted.

items.name: secret item
items.description: You have found a secret item which will probably be very useful to solving this game.

items.name: a bullet
items.description: It is a round, lead revolver bullet.

items.name: a small hatbox
items.description: The hatbox is empty but looks like it could have once held a human head.

items.name: a scroll
items.description: The old faded scroll contains a cryptic message. 'When there seems no end in sight, and you walk south with all your might, start over and repeat these steps: South then north to find the end, then find a place you haven't been.'

items.name: a painting
items.description: It is a portrait of a gentleman, shown facing left. He has a gun raised in his hand as if he is preparing for a duel.

items.name: a painting
items.description: It is a portrait of a gentleman, shown facing right. He has a gun raised in his hand as if he is preparing for a duel

items.name: a window on the west wall
items.description: Looking through the window you see a violent storm brewing outside. Every few moments lightning flashes.

items.name: paintings along the east wall
items.description: There are several paintings here, including one of a lovely young woman named April. As you gaze upon her beauty she seems to age right before your eyes into an ancient old hag.

actions.message: You carefully slide the painting aside, revealing a hidden safe built into the wall!
actions.newDescription: The painting has been moved aside, exposing the wall behind it.
actions.alreadyPerformedMessage: The painting has already been moved. The hidden safe is visible.

items.name: a window on the west wall
items.description: Looking through the window you see a violent storm brewing outside. Every few moments lightning flashes.

items.name: paintings along the east wall
items.description: There are several paintings here, including one of a ship at sea. As you blink your eyes, you suddenly see the ship has changed into a battered up ghost ship with torn sails.

items.name: a moving coffin
items.description: The coffin has been nailed shut, but something is trying to get out.

items.name: a grandfather clock
items.description: It almost looks like it is alive. Is that a face with fangs? The pendulum even looks like a pointed tail and the base looks like clawed feet. It appears to have run down and is stuck at 12:59 p.m.

actions.requiresItemMessage: You need a winding crank to do that.
actions.message: You reach up and wind the clock. As you do, the clock springs to life and starts ticking. The hands move forward to 13 and the clock begins to gong.
actions.alreadyPerformedMessage: The clock is already wound up and ticking.
actions.newDescription: It almost looks like it is alive. Is that a face with fangs? The pendulum even looks like a pointed tail and the base looks like clawed feet. The clock hands seem to be running backwards, and the little hand is pointing to 13. You hear ticking and gonging sounds coming from the clock.

actions.message: You search the clock and find a winding crank stored inside.
actions.alreadyPerformedMessage: You have already searched the clock thoroughly. There is nothing else hidden within it.

items.name: an old trumpet
items.description: The rusted old trumpet looks worthless.

items.name: a slip of paper
items.description: You look at the crumpled slip of paper and notice a faint message. It says 'Welcome to Allen's Haunted Mansion text adventure, originally created in 2002. This is a work-in-progress. Right now, you can explore the mansion and collect objects. Some sections of the game have background audio which will load and play while you are there. There are even a few puzzles to solve, but no way to win the game yet.'

items.name: a raven
items.description: The silent black bird notices you looking at it. It squawks 'Nevermore!' then is silent.

items.name: a glass slipper
items.description: It is a small glass slipper, fit for a princess, yet there is no one around who could wear it.

items.name: a wooden ladder
items.description: A sturdy wooden ladder perfect for reaching high places. You could probably climb it if you were in the right location.

items.name: a brass key
items.description: An ornate brass key with the initials 'M.G.' engraved on it. It looks like it might unlock something important.

items.name: a locked door to the east
items.description: A heavy wooden door with an ornate brass lock. The door is marked Master Gracey.

actions.requiresItemMessage: You need a key to do that.
actions.message: The brass key turns with a satisfying click in the lock. The door swings open.
actions.newName: an unlocked door to the east
actions.newDescription: A heavy wooden door that now stands ajar. It is marked Master Gracey.

actions.requiresItemMessage: You need a key to do that.
actions.message: The brass key turns with a satisfying click in the lock. You close and lock the door to the Servants Quarters.
You jiggle the handle, but the door is firmly locked. You'll need to unlock it first.

items.name: a leather bookmark
items.description: An old leather bookmark with strange mystical symbols etched into its surface. It feels warm to the touch.

items.name: a door
items.description: The doors are all identical, lined up in a row. Each one looks like it could lead to a different place.

actions.message: You press your ear against the door and listen closely. You can hear faint whispers coming from the other side. Creepy.

items.name: a door
items.description: The doors are all identical, lined up in a row. Each one looks like it could lead to a different place.

actions.message: You press your ear against the door and listen closely. You hear something scratching on the other side.

items.name: a hidden safe
items.description: The safe is built into the wall and has a combination lock. It looks like it could hold something valuable.

actions.requiresItemMessage: You need a bookmark to do that. (Yeah, I know. This is just debug code.)
actions.message: You enter the correct combination using the leather bookmark and open the safe. Inside you find a mysterious amulet!

items.name: a mysterious amulet
items.description: The amulet is intricately designed with symbols that seem to shimmer and change when you look at them. It feels warm to the touch.

items.name: Madame Leota's spellbook
items.description: The spellbook is ancient and worn, filled with arcane symbols and illustrations. It seems to hum with a faint magical energy.

items.name: a tarot card
items.description: The tarot card is intricately illustrated, depicting a mysterious figure surrounded by swirling mist. It seems to pulse with a faint energy.

items.name: a candelabra
items.description: The candelabra is made of tarnished silver and holds five candles. The candles are unlit but seem to emit a faint warmth.

items.name: a raven
items.description: The raven is perched on the chair. It eyes you suspisciously.

items.name: a crystal ball
items.description: The crystal ball is perfectly clear and smooth, but when you look into it, you see a face looking back at you.

items.name: a wooden panel
items.description: It is a panel of wood where keys may be attached. They are twelve spots labeled Stretching Room, Endless Hallway, Conservatory, Foyer, Grand Hall, Corridor of Doors, Picture Gallery, Seance Circle, Attic, Music Room, Library and Grand Stairs. Upon first glance, they all appear empty.

actions.message: Upon closer inspection, you see that one of the hooks has a small brass key hanging from it.
actions.alreadyPerformedMessage: Nothing else is hanging from the hooks.

items.name: a set of bells
items.description: There are seven bells labeled Ambassador Xavier's Lounging Lodge, Madame Leota's Boudoir, Grandfather McKim's Resting Room, Uncle Davis' Sleeping Salon, Master Gracey's Bedchamber, Colonel Coats' Bivouac Berth, and Professor Wathel's Reposing Lounge. They look like they can be rung to summon a servant to that room.

actions.message: All the bells are covered with dust except for Master Gracey's Bedchamber.
actions.alreadyPerformedMessage: You have already examined this bell.

items.name: a winding crank
items.description: A small metal crank that looks like it could be used to wind something up.
